article.title: M.C. Dean Wins $85 Million U.S. Navy Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: M.C. Dean Incorporated, Dulles, Virginia, is being awarded a more than $85 million contract modification for command, control, communications, computers, intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance initiatives and programs supported by the Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center Atlantic, European Office.Â Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center Atlantic is the contracting activity.
